fehd.ADR_TC: 九龍尖沙咀漆咸道67-71號 地下A舖及閣樓

result.adr_address: Shop A, Oriental Centre, Chatham Rd S, Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: Shop A, Oriental Centre, Chatham Rd S, Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong
result.name: Kings' Lodge

reviews.text: Such a lovely restaurant. The staff are so kind and friendly and the food is absolutely divine. The best meal I had while in Hong Kong. Great attention to detail with the refresher towel for the end of your meal and the jasmine tea served from when you arrive. I thought the tea was complimentary, but not so. Even still only $12 Hong Kong per person and is beautifully infused. My only criticism: not all the meals come out together - mine and my son’s came out so much later than everyone else’s, but this seems to be a common trend for restaurants in the country. I would happily go back, food is really reasonably priced.

Fairly good place. Not sure why google search didn’t bring up when I searched for nearby restaurants.  Hope this review helps future travelers.   Got xiaolingbao, kungpao chicken and tofu with mushroom soup.  Yummy good.  Clean upscale place.  Good service.

The foods are fantastic. I am really fond of this type of Chinese foods. The taste is definitely 4 stars, better than most Shanghai restaurants in the area. Gotta try out the signature Shanghai foods that they offer, I think you would be satisfied too. Their price is higher than other Shanghai restaurants in the area, but so is the taste. Average HKD $120 per person.
Neat and clean. However pure chinese food available only. Little expensive.

Shanghai cuisine restaurant: relatively spacious compare with other restaurants. Good cleanliness and service is ok. 
With english menu which is good for tourists. Also the portions stated clearly for easy reference.
Food a bit salty but some of the dishes need to wait for longer time. 
Overall speaking, food are tasty.

result.name: 霸王山莊 King' Lodge

reviews.text:
호불호 갈리는 리뷰들을 보면서 최대한 호의적으로 평가해보겠다는 생각으로 들어갔는데 
정말 모든면에서 미흡한 식당이었다.

우선 장소는 넓고 시원했다. 그런데 식기는 예뻤는데 설거지상태가 좋지않았다. 그냥 떼고 먹었다. 
이 식당의 위생은 설거지한 식기카트를 끌고와서 사전세팅하는
할아버지의 손에 달려있다. 자주 씻을 것 같진 않다.

식전 따뜻한 쟈스민차가 좋았다. 하지만 영수증에 찍힌 인당 12달러를 보니 그 기분은 오히려 최악으로 변했다.

마파두부를 맛있다고 써놓은 분들에 대한 분노가 있다. 이들은 마파두부를 김천에서만 먹어봤나?
상하이식완탕수프는 한국인이 시키면 소금을 두숟갈 첨가하는 것이 분명하다. 완탕에는 구멍을 내서. 소룡포는 개중에 무난했지만 다른데서 느끼지못한 고기냄새가 조금 났다.

이 영수증 메뉴중 제일 만족스러웠던 메뉴가 바로 쌀밥이다.
시간을 거꾸로 돌릴 수 있다면 더 잘 놀 자신은 없는데
킹스로지만 안갔었다면 참 좋았겠다 싶다.
세트메뉴 시키지말고 먹고싶은걸루 시키는게 좋다. 사실 볶음밥 + 마파두부만 먹고나와도 충분. 다른메뉴는 맛있다! 는 느낌보단 무난하다. 여행중에 먹을게 많으니까 조금만 먹자

Such a lovely restaurant. The staff are so kind and friendly and the food is absolutely divine. The best meal I had while in Hong Kong. Great attention to detail with the refresher towel for the end of your meal and the jasmine tea served from when you arrive. I thought the tea was complimentary, but not so. Even still only $12 Hong Kong per person and is beautifully infused. My only criticism: not all the meals come out together - mine and my son’s came out so much later than everyone else’s, but this seems to be a common trend for restaurants in the country. I would happily go back, food is really reasonably priced.

室內呈菱形。雖然如此。餐桌的擺设甚順眼。桌，椅之色澤與照明的配合。感受到光潔。坐落有舒服感。有心思！員工的對答，雖然是職業語言，帶有幾分誠懇。小籠包的皮厚韌，內裏湯汁及肉質略欠要求。擔擔麵與XX園相比有點距離。四季豆個人口味而言，加多點辣更加完美。牛腩麵點選了薯粉麵。是四方形的麵條，質感與瀨粉相似，滑浖浖的有彈性。口感爽帶有些少韌。坊間少見。其中牛腩是巨型切，味道不錯。醬茶鴨腳是一絕，鸭件皮下脂肪什厚，入口不旦不肥腻，而是爽脆。茶味雖然淡薄了些。稱霸亦不為過。甜品的豆茸包，算是一般。
샤오롱바오는 별로지만(원래 안 좋아함.) 경보궁장과 마파두부는 맛있었다. 밥 하나 콜라 두 개 추가해서 300홍콩달러쯤.

result.vicinity: Shop A, Oriental Centre, Chatham Road South, Tsim Sha Tsui
